New Records: Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets for 57 runs, the best bowling figures in a World Cup semi-final
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 117 runs off 113 balls
Shreyas Iyer scored 105 runs off 70 balls
Daryl Mitchell scored 134 runs off 119 balls
Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets for 57 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammed Shami was awarded the Man of the Match and the Cricinfo MVP award
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won the match by 70 runs
India advanced to the next stage of the World Cup
The match was played at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai
Others: The match was a 50-over match, with India batting first and scoring 397/4
The New Zealand team was bowled out for 327 runs in 48.5 overs
